mapper.select: select * from goods_info where (id like '%' || #{id} || '%' or name like '%' || #{name}) || '%' and type like #{type} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into goods_info(id, name, sell_price, purchase_price, quantity, min_discount, deduction, deduction_rate, base_unit, type, photo) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{sell_price}, #{purchase_price}, #{quantity}, #{min_discount}, #{deduction}, #{deduction_rate}, #{base_unit}, #{type}, #{photo})
mapper.update: update goods_info set name=#{name}, sell_price=#{sell_price}, purchase_price=#{purchase_price}, quantity=#{quantity}, min_discount=#{min_discount}, deduction=#{deduction}, deduction_rate=#{deduction_rate}, base_unit=#{base_unit}, type=#{type}, photo=#{photo} where id = #{id}
